document_title: What is gonorrhea? Causes and warning signs
subsection_content:
Patients should contact their doctor immediately if they notice any worrying symptoms, such as a burning sensation when urinating, or unusual pus-like discharge from the vagina, penis, or rectum. (3)
In addition, regular check-ups are also important if you have previously been diagnosed with gonorrhea. This condition may not appear with obvious signs, but if not treated effectively, it will increase the risk of reinfection.
subsection_title: benh lau.json. When to see a doctor

In addition, regular check-ups are also important if you have previously been diagnosed with gonorrhea. This condition may not appear with obvious signs, but if not treated effectively, it will increase the risk of reinfection.
